entry.title: BloomFilter issue with segwit addresses
entry.summary: In this email exchange, Andreas suggests extending the BIP37 matching rules for Bitcoin Core to include data elements in the witness. However, the respondent, Jonas, clarifies that Bitcoin Core is not an entity that can be willing to extend or reject a feature and that someone needs to propose a pull request. He also suggests that inserting the witness data into the bloom filter could be an easy solution. It appears that the discussion revolves around finding ways to optimize Bitcoin Core's functionality.
